text: Hey everyone! I have a quick question: is there a way to extend the duration for how long the `addAlert` action stays visible? I'd appreciate any tips or guidance on this! Thanks!
Hey Brad. This is a bug on our end, `roles` never returns anything. I'll be marking as `deprecated` in the types
Is it possible to import classes from an api/ folder in the app.functions folder using serverless functions? i.e. `const MyClass = require('./api/MyClass.js");`
Trying to make it where I don't have duplicate lines of code in all of my functions.

Hey everyone! I have a question about the `CrmAssociationPropertyList` and `CrmPropertyList` components. Is it possible to show these properties but make them readOnly for every user in the context of this card?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/crm-data-components/crm-property-list>
I'd like to use them to display `File` type properties and we like the clear output of these, but I would like to disable the default behaviour of displaying the "Add file" and the icons to move these up/down/remove.
For now I'm using CrmDataHighlight to display in a similar fashion without the option of editing the property values (the attachments).
Hey Brad, its not currently possible unfortunately.
Hey Leandro. It's not currently possible. I passed on this feedback to the team that owns those components internally. :+1:
Thanks, <@U04EJHVD8FM>. An optional readOnly prop would be great. :smile:
